properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELCT ROWNUM "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT CONSULT_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , USER_ID , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "ENROLL_DATE" , STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? , C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNSULT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CONSULT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CONSULT_NO , M.USER_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.MODIFY_DATE , CONSULT_ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , C.STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , RESPONDENTS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CONSULT_NO , M.USER_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.MODIFY_DATE , CONSULT_ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , C.STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , RESPONDENTS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.CONSULT_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'
